alert.note: Alert for Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CASS COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 340 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlantic, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlantic, Anita, Cumberland, Wiota, Lake Anita State Park, Atlantic Municipal Airport, and Anita Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 64 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
